"What container is safe?"

Packing Ammunition  

2 Simple Rules
  

1.      Keep the ammunition in the original shipping container, info or put it in a marked,solid container and secure the lid. info
 

2.      This packed container must weigh 30kg or less.

 

Remember: never pack loose rounds – always reuse the box they were shipped in.
